fields.name: Partner
fields.description: Your parents and relatives are so happy to see that you've got a partner that they give you double the red packets.

fields.name: Silver Tongue
fields.description: Gives you the Tongue of Silver and the ability to spew good wishes to your elders non-stop, making them very happy.

fields.name: Deep Pocket
fields.description: Give you an ultra-deep pocket to carry more red packets. No one knows how many red packets you

fields.name: "Garden" Family Assorted Biscuit
fields.description: A big box of Family Assorted Biscuit from the brand Garden. The most basic gift you could bring to a Chinese New Year gathering. You can feel the judgy looks...
